00046 #include "pdca.h"
00047 
00048 
00049 volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t *pdca_get_handler(int pdca_ch_number)
00050 {
00051   volatile avr32_pdca_t* pdca = (volatile avr32_pdca_t*) &AVR32_PDCA;
00052   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) &pdca->channel[pdca_ch_number]; // get the correct channel pointer
00053 
00054   if( (pdca_ch_number >= AVR32_PDCA_CHANNEL_LENGTH) )
00055     return (volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t *) PDCA_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00056 
00057   return (volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_channel;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 int pdca_init_channel(int pdca_ch_number, const pdca_channel_options_t *opt)
00062 {
00063   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00064 
00065   pdca_disable_interrupt_transfer_complete(pdca_ch_number); // disable channel interrupt
00066   pdca_disable_interrupt_reload_counter_zero(pdca_ch_number); // disable channel interrupt
00067 
00068   pdca_channel->mar= opt->addr;
00069   pdca_channel->tcr = opt->size;
00070   pdca_channel->psr = opt->pid;
00071   pdca_channel->marr = opt->r_addr;
00072   pdca_channel->tcrr = opt->r_size;
00073   pdca_channel->mr = opt->mode;
00074 
00075   return PDCA_SUCCESS;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 void pdca_disable(int pdca_ch_number)
00080 {
00081   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00082 
00083   // Disable transfer
00084   pdca_channel->cr = AVR32_PDCA_TDIS_MASK;
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void pdca_enable(int pdca_ch_number)
00090 {
00091   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00092 
00093   // Enable transfer
00094   pdca_channel->cr = AVR32_PDCA_TEN_MASK;
00095 }

00098 int pdca_get_channel_status(int pdca_ch_number)
00099 {
00100   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00101 
00102   return pdca_channel->SR.ten ;
00103 }

00106 void pdca_set_memory_add(int pdca_ch_number, unsigned long mem_add, int transfer_counter)
00107 {
00108   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00109 
00110   pdca_channel->mar= mem_add;
00111   pdca_channel->tcr = transfer_counter;
00112 }

00115 void pdca_set_peripheral_select(int pdca_ch_number, int pid)

00117   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00118 
00119   pdca_channel->psr = pid;
00120 }

00131 void pdca_enable_interrupt_transfer_complete(int pdca_ch_number)
00132 {
00133   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00134 
00135   pdca_channel->ier = AVR32_PDCA_TRC_MASK;
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 void pdca_disable_interrupt_transfer_complete(int pdca_ch_number)
00140 {
00141   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00142 
00143   pdca_channel->idr = AVR32_PDCA_TRC_MASK;
00144 }

00147 void pdca_enable_interrupt_reload_counter_zero(int pdca_ch_number)
00148 {
00149   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00150 
00151   pdca_channel->ier = AVR32_PDCA_RCZ_MASK;
00152 }

00154 
00155 void pdca_disable_interrupt_reload_counter_zero(int pdca_ch_number)
00156 {
00157   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00158 
00159   pdca_channel->idr = AVR32_PDCA_RCZ_MASK;
00160 }

00163 unsigned int pdca_get_transfer_status(int pdca_ch_number)
00164 {
00165   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number); // get the correct channel pointer
00166 
00167   return pdca_channel->isr;
00168 }

00170 
00171 void pdca_reload_channel(int pdca_ch_number, unsigned int address, unsigned int size)
00172 {
00173   // get the correct channel pointer
00174   volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t* pdca_channel =(volatile avr32_pdca_channel_t*) pdca_get_handler(pdca_ch_number);
00175 
00176   // disable channel interrupt
00177   pdca_disable_interrupt_reload_counter_zero(pdca_ch_number);
00178   // set up next memory address
00179   pdca_channel->marr = address;
00180   // set up next memory size
00181   pdca_channel->tcrr = size;
00182   // Enable channel interrupt
00183   pdca_enable_interrupt_reload_counter_zero(pdca_ch_number);
00184 }
